EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-3843 : Email Template for Partner Inquiries queue
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Inquiries Closed Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Partner Inquiries Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PARTNER INQUIRIES
Your IHS Markit Partner Inquiries Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The IHS Markit Partner Inquiries Team has completed your request and closed case number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
Kind regards, IHS Markit Partner Inquiries Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
